name: There are hundreds
description:
Welcome to, There are hundreds!

This is a one man project, my first in fact. The goal of this game is to receive feedback, and if you desire you can donate to support this project.

Features

- 150 zombies on a decently large map.

- Dark map with a silenced Ak-47, along with a flash light.

- New arena mode is in the make along with a plethora of updates on the way.

- Multiplayer, need to use a LAN service, such as hamachi or something similar.

          NOTE: The multiplayer is in beta.

Upcoming features,

- Base building

- Zombie skins

- New Weapons

- New day/night cycle

- Arena mode

- Wave mode

- Food system

- Random loot system

Much more.

Note, the game is in it's way to early stages but if you fund it enjoyable in the slightest then dope! Glad you did!

By purchasing this game, you get full access to all updates and a steam CD-key upon completion!
